if(categories.some(cat=>cat.id===newCategory.id&&cat.id!==editingCategory.id)){setError('A category with this ID already exists');return;}try{if(dbInitialized){await categoryDB.update(newCategory);const updatedCategories=await categoryDB.getAll();setCategories(updatedCategories);}else{setCategories(categories.map(cat=>cat.id===editingCategory.id?newCategory:cat));}setEditingCategory(null);setNewCategory({id:'',name:''});setError('');}catch(error){console.error('Error updating category:',error);setError('Failed to update category.
